overview: BIRD IN THE SKY  is a gritty, poetic tale of a young manâ€™s spiritual struggle on the streets of New York City. Rob has been given a second chance to right the wrongs of his street-wise past; he must perform a miracle to be saved. His fate lies in his love for a young woman, Kay, who is coping with the loss of her child.
tagline: crossing the line between crime and miracle
title: BIRD IN THE SKY
